content:
@Eric Haas, I've done a decent cleanup of the VhDir IG to get it into shape for R4, and the qa.html for it has almost no issues in the StructureDefinitions, however there are thousands of broken links (and some example issues).
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/VhDir/qa.html
Could the broken links be due to IG template issues? (It was copied from an old US Core IG long ago)
Just looking for some advice/tips here if possible...

Build log has heaps of stuff like this in it.

Liquid Warning: Liquid syntax error (line 71): Unexpected character { in "{{site.data.structuredefinitions.ehr.status}} == "active"" in StructureDefinition-ehr.html

I think its the Jekyl logic on this line
https://github.com/HL7/VhDir/blob/e9be36828edc2f66f860989cf151fbcdd03f4d4a/sd.html#L83
needs to be changed to

{% if site.data.structuredefinitions.{{[id]}}.status == "active" %}

(but I have no Idea on Jekly at this point)
Let me take a look. I had link errors too and could not figure them out. Its not a us core thing. GG did a new build too which fixes some of the extension link errors
and those liquid errors I can easily fix
